titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Angelo Bartlett Giamatti, President of Yale University, Inauguration Records
Giamatti (Angelo Bartlett), President of Yale University, Inauguration Records
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Tuesday April 23, 2019 at 08:07

did.unittitle: Angelo Bartlett Giamatti, president of Yale University, inauguration records

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of invitation responses documenting those who attended, declined, did not respond, or were platform speakers at the inauguration of A. Bartlett Giamatti as president of Yale.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 2-A (YRG 2-A), Records of the Yale president's office.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the records is restricted. See Collection Contents for details.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Angelo Bartlett Giamatti, President of Yale University, Inauguration Records (RU 373). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Yale University records are arranged and described at the accession level by the creating office. The University Archives creates collection level descriptive records, but typically does no further arrangement and description at the accession level.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged alphabetically by last name of guest.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of invitation responses documenting those who attended, declined, did not respond, or were platform speakers at the inauguration of A. Bartlett Giamatti as president of Yale.
